snippet: Hitting a jackpot might fulfill a lifetime dream, but financial planners warn of the pitfalls that often accompany a windfall.
abstract: Financial planners warn that managing a financial windfall can be a stressful, hazardous undertaking that must be navigated with great care to avoid wasting a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity; beneficiaries of a substantial payday, like a lottery winner, heir to an estate or a shareholder that goes public, may suddenly confront a wide range of unfamiliar life choices.
lead_paragraph: Hitting a jackpot might fulfill a lifetime dream, but financial planners warn of the pitfalls that often accompany a windfall.

headline.seo: Avoiding the Pitfalls of a Windfall
